id.comment: Queries 1 - 3 - Test cases for Follows relation. Sequential Follows - true

query.querystr: variable v; Select v such that Follows(2, 3)

id.comment: Follows over long break - true

query.querystr: constant c; Select c such that Follows(4, 9)

id.comment: Sequential Follows into/out container - false

query.querystr: assign a; Select a such that Follows(4, 5)

id.comment: Queries 4 - 6 - Test cases for Follows* relation. Sequential Follows* - true

query.querystr: print pn; Select pn such that Follows*(6, 7)

id.comment: Follows* over long break - true

query.querystr: stmt s; Select s such that Follows*(1, 15)

id.comment: Follows* into/out container - false

query.querystr: read r; Select r such that Follows*(10, 13)

id.comment: Queries 7 - 9 - Test parent relation. Direct Parent - true

query.querystr: if ifs; Select ifs such that Parent(4, 6)

id.comment: 2nd nested child to 1st nested Parent - true

query.querystr: while w; Select w such that Parent(7, 8)

id.comment: 2nd nested child to 0 nested Parent - false

query.querystr: stmt s; Select s such that Parent(4, 8)

id.comment: Queries 10 - 12 - Test Parent* relation. Direct Parent* - true

query.querystr: if ifs; assign a; Select ifs such that Parent*(ifs, a)

id.comment: 2nd nested child to 1st nested Parent* - true

query.querystr: assign a; Select a such that Parent*(7, a)

id.comment: 2nd nested child to 0 nested Parent* - true

query.querystr: while w; Select w such that Parent*(w, 8)

id.comment: Queries 13 - 15 - Test Uses relation. assign definition - true

query.querystr: assign a; Select a such that Uses(a, _)

id.comment: print definition - true

query.querystr: print pn; Select pn such that Uses(pn, "y")

id.comment: container definition - true

query.querystr: while w; Select w such that Uses(w, "z")

id.comment: Queries 16 - 18 - Test Modifies relation. assign definition - true

query.querystr: assign a; Select a such that Modifies(a, "x")

id.comment: read definition - true

query.querystr: read r; variable v; Select r such that Modifies(r, v)

id.comment: container definition - true

query.querystr: if ifs; Select ifs such that Modifies(ifs, "x")

id.comment: Queries 19 - 21 - Test pattern assign relation. Select result not related - true

query.querystr: procedure proc; assign a; Select proc pattern a("z", _"z"_)

id.comment: Select assign related - true

query.querystr: assign a; Select a pattern a(_, _"y"_)

id.comment: Select variable related - true

query.querystr: variable v; assign a; Select v pattern a(v, _)

id.comment: Queries 22 - 39 - Test s.t. and p.a. combinations for each s.t. clause. Select result not related, Follows and pattern assign

query.querystr: stmt s; assign a; print pn; Select s such that Follows(10, pn) pattern a(_, _)

id.comment: Select result related to 1 clause, Follows and pattern assign

query.querystr: print pn; assign a; Select pn such that Follows(pn, _) pattern a("x", _)

id.comment: Select result related to both, Follows and pattern assign

query.querystr: assign a; stmt s; Select a such that Follows(a, s) pattern a(_, _"y"_)

id.comment: Select result not related, Follows* and pattern assign

query.querystr: assign a; if ifs; constant c; Select c pattern a("z", _"z"_) such that Follows*(ifs, 15)

id.comment: Select result related to 1 clause, Follows* and pattern assign

query.querystr: assign a; Select a such that Follows*(_, _) pattern a(_, _"target"_)

id.comment: Select result related to both, Follows* and pattern assign

query.querystr: assign a, a1; variable v; Select a such that Follows*(a, a1) pattern a(v, _)

id.comment: Select result not related, Parent and pattern assign

query.querystr: assign a; while w, w1; if ifs; Select ifs such that Parent(w, w1) pattern a(_, _"z"_)

id.comment: Select result related to 1 clause, Parent and pattern assign

query.querystr: assign a; stmt s; Select s such that Parent(s, 13) pattern a(_, _)

id.comment: Select result related to both, Parent and pattern assign

query.querystr: assign a; Select a pattern a(_, _) such that Parent(4, a)

id.comment: Select result not related, Parent* and pattern assign

query.querystr: assign a; read r; Select r such that Parent*(4, 8) pattern a("z", _)

id.comment: Select result related to 1 clause, Parent* and pattern assign

query.querystr: assign a; if ifs; variable v; Select ifs pattern a(v, _) such that Parent*(ifs, 12)

id.comment: Select result related to both, Parent* and pattern assign

query.querystr: assign a; Select a pattern a(_, _) such that Parent*(4, a)

id.comment: Select result not related, Uses and pattern assign

query.querystr: assign a; procedure proc; stmt s; variable v; Select proc such that Uses(s, v) pattern a("x", _)

id.comment: Select result related to 1 clause, Uses and pattern assign

query.querystr: assign a; print pn; variable v; Select pn such that Uses(pn, v) pattern a(_, _)

id.comment: Select result related to 2 clause, Uses and pattern assign

query.querystr: assign a; variable v; stmt s; Select v pattern a(v, _) such that Uses(s, v)

id.comment: Select result not related, Modifies and pattern assign

query.querystr: assign a; constant c; Select c such that Modifies(2, "y") pattern a(_, _"target"_)

id.comment: Select result related to 1 clause, Modifies and pattern assign

query.querystr: assign a; read r; Select a pattern a(_, _"x"_) such that Modifies(r, "target")

id.comment: Select result related to both, Modifies and pattern assign

query.querystr: assign a; variable v; Select a such that Modifies(a, "z") pattern a("z", _"y"_)
